.. _pyMF6_python:

Python Modules
------------------------------

A Python module is used to replace the main program block of MODFLOW 6 
for coupled simulation. This replacement permits the calling of modified 
Fortran routines to allow for interprocess communication with **mHSP2**.


.. _pyMF6_pyMF6py_py:

pyMF6py.py
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. automodule:: pyMF6py 
    :members:


.. _pyMF6_logger_py:

pyMFLogger.py
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. automodule:: pyMF6Logger 
    :members:
